title: How to Improve Your Skill in Halo

steps.headline: Use the Magnum.
steps.description: The Mag is not the most amazing and powerful weapon, but you should always carry one around.

steps.headline: Exploit the assault rifle.
steps.description: The assault rifle may have a wide spread and many people tend not to use it, but if you get your opponents' shields down, it can be a dangerous weapon.

steps.headline: Use the shotgun.
steps.description: The shotgun seems like a simple weapon, but it is hard to get a precise hit unless your assailant is charging straight toward you. Make sure that you get very close in before even thinking about using this.

steps.headline: Use the Sniper.
steps.description: The sniper, by far, is probably the greatest weapon in the game. It is long and short range if you learn to use it right. It is also an EXCELLENT weapon to wield with the shotgun. The shotgun can take out people who try to sneak behind you and melee you. That's when you turn around and point blank them. Also with the sniper you have the option to snipe anywhere on many maps, such as blood gulch, boarding action, or infinity.

steps.headline: Start with frag grenades.
steps.description: There is nothing more deadly (and idiotic) than trying to stick someone with a plasma grenade and missing completely. Use fragmentation grenades first because they are easier to aim and may be better than plasma grenades.

steps.headline: Throw it in front.
steps.description: The easiest way to get someone with a grenade is to throw it in their paths. Say someone was shooting at you and strafing left, what would you do? Throw it in the direction he is going. It is hard to avoid a grenade if it is thrown directly in their path.

Make sure that you get very close in before even thinking about using this. Use the Sniper. The sniper, by far, is probably the greatest weapon in the game. It is long and short range if you learn to use it right. It is also an EXCELLENT weapon to wield with the shotgun. The shotgun can take out people who try to sneak behind you and melee you. That's when you turn around and point blank them. Also with the sniper you have the option to snipe anywhere on many maps, such as blood gulch, boarding action, or infinity. Grenades Start with frag grenades. There is nothing more deadly (and idiotic) than trying to stick someone with a plasma grenade and missing completely. Use fragmentation grenades first because they are easier to aim and may be better than plasma grenades. Throw it in front. The easiest way to get someone with a grenade is to throw it in their paths. Say someone was shooting at you and strafing left, what would you do? Throw it in the direction he is going. It is hard to avoid a grenade if it is thrown directly in their path.
